contents:
是旧闻，源自Business Insider（翻译成Olds，毕竟不是News）：
https://www.businessinsider.com/mark-zuckerberg-china-tiktok-censorship-2019-10?op=1&r=US&IR=T
2019-10-17 - Aaron Holmes - Mark Zuckerberg just slammed China for allegedly censoring Hong Kong protest videos on TikTok: 'Is that the internet we want?'
